Package simplerjogl

Class Summary
Color A class to manage RGBA Color objects for SimplerJOGL applications
Frame A class to display a Swing window containing an OpenGL canvas, based closely on Pepijn Van Eeckhoudt's work for the NeHe JOGL Demo Ports< /a>.
Light A wrapper for OpenGL lights in SimplerJOGL applications
Material A wrapper class for materials
Model  
Renderer A GLEventListener class -- that is, a class that is capable of drawing to a GL context.
TextureLoader A texture loading class -- copied wholesale from Eric Itomura's post at Java Game Development< /a> It should be capable of loading JPEG, GIF and PNG files as textures.
Vertex A class to manage 2D and 3D homogeneous coordinates for SimplerJOGL applications
